posts.post_content:
For sale, all prices include shipping.

1907 Morgan Red Belts - "Practice Makes Perfect" (couple of creases, small paper tear in bottom left corner, writing on the back) - $80

1912 Norwood Souvenir Co. (Palace of the Fans) - Corner wear, couple small creases, writing on the back, small area of paper loss on back - $125

1919 Cincinnati Reds Champions Post Cards
        - Eddie Gerner - small crease top center edge, light corner wear, two small ink marks on back - $45

        - Heinie Groh - small crease in top right corner, very clean and glossy front and back - $100

        - Morris Rath - Light corner wear, clean and clear front and back - $75

        - Eddie Roush - very small crease top right corner, very clean and glossy front and back, this card looks awesome - $200

        - Ivy Wingo - several creases in left top corner and along top edge, clear and clean image and back - $75
